mapper.insert: INSERT INTO promotion(promono, promotitle, promocontent, promodisc, promovalid, promostart, promoend ) VALUES (promo_seq.nextval, #{promotitle}, #{promocontent}, #{promodisc}, #{promovalid}, #{promostart}, #{promoend})
mapper.select: SELECT promono, promotitle, promocontent, promodisc, promovalid, promostart, promoend FROM promotion ORDER BY promono
